moves.name: Inferno
moves.description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. It leaves the target with a burn.

moves.name: Hone Claws
moves.description: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Incinerate
moves.description: The user attacks the target with fire. If the target is holding a Berry, the Berry becomes burnt up and unusable.

moves.name: Lick
moves.description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Odor Sleuth
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit with Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Bind
moves.description: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

moves.name: Fire Spin
moves.description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

moves.name: Fury Swipes
moves.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

moves.name: Snatch
moves.description: The user steals the effects of any healing or stat-changing move the opponent attempts to use.

moves.name: Flame Burst
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.

moves.name: Bug Bite
moves.description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

moves.name: Slash
moves.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Amnesia
moves.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Stockpile
moves.description: The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def. The move can be used three times.

moves.name: Spit Up
moves.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack. The more power is stored, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Swallow
moves.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more power heals more HP.

moves.name: Inferno
moves.description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. It leaves the target with a burn.
